  • Constructor Details

    • Stage

      public Stage(int raceId, String stageName, String description, double length, LocalDateTime startTime, StageType type)
      The constructor for the Stage class
      Parameters:
      raceId - : The ID number for the race the stage belongs to
      stageName - : The name of the stage
      description - : the description of the stage
      length - : The length of the stage measured in kilometres
      startTime - : The time that the stage starts
      type - : the type of stage (eg FLAT,MEDIUM MOUNTAIN,HIGH MOUNTAIN,or TT) segmentIdList: A list of ids of segments associated with the stage setIsConcluded: Whether the stage is ready for results or not
